subject: Indian Polity
topic: Panchayati Raj aur Nagariya Swashasan (73rd & 74th Amendment)

question_en: What is the role of the 73rd and 74th Constitutional Amendment in Panchayati Raj and Nagrik Swasthya Karya?
A_en: The 73rd and 74th Constitutional Amendment have enhanced the powers of Panchayats and Municipalities in providing healthcare services.
B_en: The 73rd and 74th Constitutional Amendment have increased the role of Panchayats and Municipalities in governing local areas.
C_en: The 73rd and 74th Constitutional Amendment have introduced changes in the Panchayat and Nagrik Swasthya Karya systems.
D_en: The 73rd and 74th Constitutional Amendment have brought improvements in the functioning of Panchayat and Nagrik Swasthya Karya systems.
answer_en: The 73rd and 74th Constitutional Amendment have increased the role of Panchayats and Municipalities in providing healthcare services.
